HomePage.loginRecommendation: If you log in, we will recommend products just for you.
HomePage.findTravelsHere: Find the travels you need here
HomePage.copyright: Â© 2023 - 2024 TanuSoft LLC. All rights reserved.
HomePage.companyDescription: Our company was founded in 2002, and it is a group company with a tourism marketing and service network, not only in Mongolia but also with branch offices in foreign countries such as the USA, Japan, China, and Taiwan.
HomePage.statistic3: Years of experience in the travel industry
HomePage.togetherStrong3: We provide services for receiving foreign tourists, currently collaborating with over 150 travel operators from 23 countries, welcoming an average of 10,000 tourists to Mongolia annually.
HomePage.togetherStrong4: We regularly organize international travels to about 70 destinations in more than 40 countries, and annually arrange trips for an average of over 5,000 Mongolian tourists.
HomePage.togetherStrong5: In the beautiful nature of our homeland, we will guide you, the Mongolian, to travel comfortably and with peace of mind. Whether it's Altai Tavan Bogd, Ulaagchikh Lake, Khyargas Lake, Khuvsgul Lake, mazaalai, Meneng Steppe, Dornod, Buir Lake, Shiliin Bogd, Kharkhorin, Tsagaan Suvarga, Khermen Tsav, Terelj, Khagiin Khar Lake, Mungun Morit, Burkhan Khaldun Mountain, the land of Genghis Khan, Khamriin Khiid, or Saikhan Khotol, join us in creating domestic travel programs that take you to every corner of Mongolia.
